column3: Thresholds for Diabetes Mellitus Patient (per serving 50g)

column2: Potassium Bromate (used in some bread products)
Disodium Inosinate and Disodium Guanylate (flavor enhancers)
Oleic Acid (found in some processed foods)
Titanium Dioxide (used as a whitening agent)
Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (used in some food foaming agents)
Dimethylpolysiloxane (used in some fast-food frying oils)
DATEM (Diacetyl Tartaric Acid Esters of Monoglycerides)
